author: IGN
title: Why you need to see SINNERS, starring Michael B. Jordan. Presented by @WarnerBrosAustralia

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for AI Limit, an anime action souls-like game developed by Sense Games Studio. Players will follow the trials and tribulations of an immortal Blader named Arrisa in search of her true nature and origin as the world dives into destruction. Combat dangerous enemies, explore the city, and believe in the hope of a new life. AI Limit is launching on March 27 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#AILimit #Gaming #IGN
title: AI Limit - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for The Last Spark of Hope, a sci-fi drama film distributed by Saban Films.

A woman who may be the last human on Earth struggles to survive with only her robot companion. As she battles the harsh realities of her existence, the stakes intensify when her once-trusted robot turns against her.

The Last Spark of Hope stars Magdalena Wieczorek and Jacek Beler. The film is produced by Beata Pisula alongside being written and directed by Piotr Biedron. 

The Last Spark of Hope will be released on VOD and Digital on April 29.

#TheLastSparkOfHope #Movies #IGN
title: The Last Spark of Hope - Official Trailer (2025) Magdalena Wieczorek, Jacek Beler

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Spring to Life Overview Trailer for Minecraft, a creation adventure game developed by Mojang. Players can get a look at the Spring to Life drop that sets out to give a Spring-themed facelift to multiple biomes and elements within Minecraft. From new animals, plants, and more alongside new sounds across the game. The Spring to Life drop for Minecraft is coming in March 2025.

#Minecraft #SpringToLife #Gaming
title: Minecraft - Official Spring to Life Overview Trailer | Minecraft LIVE 2025

author: IGN
description: The Assassin's Creed franchise has spanned the globe since it debuted in 2007, and entries have taken players from Renaissance Italy to Feudal Japan to the American Revolution. Along the way, the series has changed dramatically, from sequels that made good on the promise of past entries to entirely new takes on character progression. IGN's biggest Assassin's Creed fans came together to agree, argue, and eventually cull together our favorites.
title: Top 10 Assassin's Creed Games (AC Shadows Update)

author: IGN
description:
One of Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ less flashy features is changing seasons. You’ve got two playable heroes and four possible seasons for them to enjoy. You can actually manually change those seasons in game, but doing so can be a little confusing. Let’s break it down.

0:00 - Intro
0:24 - How to Change Seasons
1:30 - Seasonal Differences

#AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming #IGN
title: How to Change Seasons in Assassin's Creed Shadows

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Jimmy Lee Trailer for River City Girls 2, an action-adventure beat-em-up game developed by WayForward. Players will be able to fight with one-half of the Double Dragons as Jimmy Lee. Jimmy Lee is quick to anger but always prepared to annihilate the yakuza threat. Jimmy Lee is coming to River City Girls 2 as part of the Double Dragon DLC available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#RiverCityGirls2 #JimmyLee #Gaming
title: River City Girls 2 - Official Jimmy Lee Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this Assassin's Creed Shadows walkthrough, we're taking you through every Kofun in AC Shadows to grab all the Legendary Chests, and then looting all the extra chests as well. There are 10 Kofuns, and depending on the Kofun, you will need to either use Naoe or Yasuke to complete it.

00:00 - Intro
00:08 - Old Kofun (Izumi Settsu Region) - Naoe
04:42 - Makino Kurumazuka Kofun (Izumi Settsu Region) - Yasuke
11:40 - Ancient Tomb of Nanjo Kofun (Yamashiro Region) - Naoe
17:44 - Azuchi Hyotanyama Kofun (Omi Region) - Yasuke
22:33 - Takagi Kofun (Harima Region) - Yasuke
31:43 - Veiled Tumulus Kofun (Wakasa Region) - Naoe
37:03 - Ishibutai Kofun (Yamato Region) - Naoe
41:57 - Megalithic Vault Kofun (Yamato Region) - Yasuke
48:07 - Chasuriyama Kofun (Tamba Region) - Naoe
53:02 - Shimosato Kofun (Kii Region) - Yasuke

For more tips, tricks, and guides for Assassin's Creed Shadows, head to the IGN wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/assassins-creed-shadows/

#AssassinsCreedShadows #Kofun #Gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: All Kofun Locations and Walkthroughs

author: IGN
description:
Hoppy April, Everybunny - Spring has sprung and with it comes a bountiful basket of brand new video games to give you a good excuse to stay inside and avoid all that pollen - here are April 2025’s biggest game releases.

#April #Gaming #IGN 

Timecodes:
00:00 INTRO, Nif Nif, Koira, Steel Hunters, Elroy and the Aliens
01:31 The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered, SAND, Roman Triumph Survival City Builder, Ekoh Beach
02:21 The Renovator Origins, Peppered An Existential Platformer, South of Midnight, Battlefield Waltz
03:17 Tiny Garden, All in Abyss Judge the Fake, Commandos Origins, Driveloop Survivors
03:56 Descenders Next, Monster Energy Supercross 25, Promise Mascot Agency, Blue Prince
05:04 The Talos Principle Reawakened, Star Overdrive, Willow Guard, Big Buck Hunter Ultimate Trophy
06:08 Dive the Depths, Lost Records Bloom and Rage Tape 2, Mandragora Whispers of the Witch Tree, Phantom Breaker Battle Grounds Ultimate
07:05 Rusty Rabbit, Wizdom Academy, Lunar Remastered Collection, Malik
title: The Biggest Game Releases of April 2025
